hud_actionbar_text.visible: (($actionbar_text = 'lol') or ($actionbar_text = 'paper') or ($actionbar_text = 'first_steps') or ($actionbar_text = 'full_copper') or ($actionbar_text = 'pig_Quest_complete') or ($actionbar_text = 'hero_Quest_complete') or ($actionbar_text = 'village_Quest_complete') or ($actionbar_text = 'iron_Quest_complete'))

hud_title_text.visible: (($title_text = 'lol') or ($title_text = 'paper') or ($title_text = 'first_steps') or ($title_text = 'full_copper') or ($title_text = 'pig_Quest_complete') or ($title_text = 'hero_Quest_complete') or ($title_text = 'village_Quest_complete') or ($title_text = 'iron_Quest_complete'))

text_panel_nutt_toast@text_panel_toast_t.$content_text: Coconut nut is a giant nut?
